content.raw:
I resolved conflicts, and have installed ign-physics based on [#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-physics/pull-requests/32](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-physics/pull-requests/32/feature-system-part-7-features-for/diff). I get the following build error:

/home/nkoenig/work/ignition/ign-gazebo/src/systems/Physics.cc:21:10: fatal error: ignition/physics/FeatureList.hh: No such file or directory  
\#include <ignition/physics/FeatureList.hh>
